QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Scarlet Halls
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to the Scarlet Halls, northeast of the Undercity, immediately!$B$BCrusader activity has picked up throughout the plaguelands and elsewhere. The Warchief believes a revival is underway, and this will NOT be tolerated.$b$bEnter the Scarlet Halls to crush their armory and lay waste to their library before they can mobilize.
